synopsis.text: As the aftermath of a devastating war continues to plague a futuristic Japan, Shinjūrō Yūki, a once-defeated detective, finds himself in an unlikely partnership with his enigmatic assistant, Inga. Together, they delve into the depths of crime-solving, only to have their triumphs consistently overshadowed by the renowned super detective, Rinroku Kaishō. In this prequel, the story unfolds the fateful encounter between Shinjūrō and Inga, unveiling a series of previously unanswered mysteries that led to their unique alliance. As the narrative intertwines with the first episode of the TV series, viewers are treated to a deeper understanding of the duo's past, setting the stage for their intriguing journey ahead.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
